item.title: How do you make items unspawnable and untradeable?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

your pickup command:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int sID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

	if (sID != #### && sID != #### && sID != ####) {
                if (sID >= 0 && sID <= 30000) {
                    addItem(sID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } else {
                sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }[/code]

change the #### to your ids, you can also have more than 3 or less. if you wanted lots of items not spawnable, then i suggest you make an array.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make items unspawnable and untradeable?
